_header: It is beginning of the days brightness
_description: Three characteristics of dawn, which are compared with advent/birth of the Virgin Mary — three rhyming lines in a sermon

CULKk424.Transcription:
hyt ys be gynnyng of þe dayes bryȝthnessehyt ys lettyng of
                    þe penys of wykkydnesse& hyt ys lykyng & cause of
                    gladnesse
CULKk424.Editions:
Wenzel,  Siegfried. 
             Preachers, Poets and the English Lyric.
         Princeton: Princeton Univ. Press, 1986: 122-3.
